attributes.title: Worst app🐷🟠
attributes.review: This app gave my phone a virus🚫. Every time I entered the app it would kick me out. It would glitch so bad to the point my phone would shut off📴. Over all worst app I have ever downloaded 🤢.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This app had the worst download time and was a pain to use. It always glitches out and took up way too much of my data!

attributes.title: Worst thing ever
attributes.review: This is the worst app that you can ever get in the App Store DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT I promise you this app has so many problems on it that you can’t even understand worst thing ever so just please go ahead and rate it a ONE STAR RIGHT NOW

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: This is a very bad app. It gave me a bad virus as soon as I opened the app. I immediately deleted. It made my phone shut off for about 15 minutes and now my phone is lagging. I wouldn’t recommend this app. bye!!

attributes.title: Don’t Download this app
attributes.review: When I went to open the app it crashed due to all the bugs on the home page!!!😡😡 I just wanted to educate myself on why people voted for this man!😡 Also Manny for president🖤💛🖤💛!!!!!

attributes.title: DO NOT GET!!
attributes.review: When my mother saw that I had this downloaded she fainted and hit her head on the table causing her to bleed everywhere. We had to take her to the emergency room where they took her into surgery. So disappointed! 😡

attributes.title: Do Not Download!!!
attributes.review: Uses up my battery very fast and hardly runs even with good wifi. Not only does the app not work but it supports terrible ideals and morals. App should be taken down!

attributes.title: Absolutely awful, just the worst, atrocious.
attributes.review: I downloaded this app, and after four minutes I was bombarded by thousands of gamma rays. I now have 40 different diseases that the doctors can not identify. Would not recomend.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE!
attributes.review: this is by far the WORST app i have EVER used! it took so long to download and it laggy, glitchy, and most of all: it’s all about trump. this app is stupid and should be taken off of the app store immediately!

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD 👎🏽🍑
attributes.review: I wanted to share my opinion on how HORRIBLE THIS APP IS!! I needed to warn others and I read a review that had a similar experience with orange ninjas showing up and saying that If I didn’t give a 5 star review they’d hurt me but good thing i’m a black belt..... BE SAFE DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!
